verses.verse: The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices<s%> in your <S%H5797>strength,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> How <S%H3966>greatly<s%> he <S%H1523>rejoices<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation!<s%>
You have <S%H5414>given<s%> him his <S%H3820>heart<s%>'s <S%H8378>desire,<s%> and have not <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H782>request<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
For you <S%H6923>meet<s%> him with the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H2896>goodness.<s%> You <S%H7896>set<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H5414>you,<s%> you gave it to <S%H753>him,<s%> even length of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
His <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> You <S%H7737>lay<s%> <S%H1935>honor<s%> and majesty on <S%H1926>him.<s%>
For you <S%H7896>make<s%> him most <S%H1293>blessed<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%> You <S%H7896>make<s%> him <S%H8057>glad<s%> with joy in your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
For the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Through the loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High,<s%> he shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> will find <S%H4672>out<s%> all of your <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> will find <S%H4672>out<s%> those who hate <S%H8130>you.<s%>

You will <S%H7896>make<s%> them as a <S%H784>fiery<s%> <S%H8574>furnace<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H6440>anger.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%> in his <S%H639>wrath.<s%> The <S%H784>fire<s%> shall devour <S%H398>them.<s%>
You will <S%H6>destroy<s%> their <S%H6529>descendants<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> their <S%H2233>posterity<s%> from among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
For they <S%H5186>intended<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H2803>you.<s%> They plotted <S%H4209>evil<s%> against you which cannot <S%H3201>succeed.<s%>
For you will <S%H7896>make<s%> them turn their <S%H7926>back,<s%> when you <S%H3559>aim<s%> drawn <S%H4340>bows<s%> at their <S%H6440>face.<s%>
Be <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in your <S%H5797>strength,<s%> so we will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and <S%H2167>praise<s%> your <S%H1369>power.<s%>
